name: Equus Flight Academy, LLC
about: Equus Flight Academy, LLC is a premier flight training institution dedicated to providing high-quality aviation education. Located at several airports, we offer FAA Part 141 Private Pilot Flight Training Programs, which are structured to take students from zero experience to a Private Pilot Certificate in as little as 35 hours. Our programs are designed to be completed in 6 months, with the option to finish in as little as 3 months. We also provide Certified Flight Instructor (CFI) training, preparing pilots to become effective and knowledgeable instructors. With a strong emphasis on safety, professionalism, and student success, Equus Flight Academy fosters a community of enthusiastic and skilled aviators. Join us to experience the thrill of flying and embark on a rewarding aviation career.
